# Overview


```{r tbl-coracobrachialis-oian}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

# Load the here package
library(here)

# Source the functions script
source(here("scripts/gt_oian.R"))

# Example usage
identifier_col <- "muscle_identifier"  # or "group_identifier"
filter_patterns <- "coracobrachialis"
display_columns <- c("name_final", "origin_final", "insertion_final", "innervation_final", "action_final")
table_title <- "Coracobrachialis muscle"

# Call the function
gt_table <- gt_oian(identifier_col, filter_patterns, display_columns, table_title)

gt_table
```

# Origin {#origin}

Coracoid process of [Scapula]({{< var ref-scapula-bone.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Insertion {#insertion}

Middle 1/3 of [Humerus]({{< var ref-humerus-bone.path >}}) (in line with crest of lesser tubercle) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Nerve
[Musculocutaneous N.]({{< var ref-musculocutaneous-nerve.path >}}) ([C5]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c5 >}}), [C6]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c6 >}}), [C7]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c7 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Action {#action}

**GHJ**: Flexion, Adduction, Internal rotation @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
